description: TECHNICAL SUPPORT FOR BADAN REHABILITASI DAN REKONSTRUKSI (BRR) NAD - NIAS

subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description:
Enhanced technical capacity of the BRR to develop policies and programmes, to appraise proposals submitted by other organizations and to monitor programme implementation

Phase 3 (Jan 2010-June 2012)
Enhanced technical capacity of the Bappenas, to develop policies and programmes, to appraise proposals submitted by other organisations, and to monitor programme implementation.
